flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to replace 30*10=<<30*10=300>>300 ball bearings
The normal price is 300*1=$<<300*1=300>>300
Because of the sale he only has to pay 300*0.75=$<<300*0.75=225>>225
He then gets a discount which shaves another 225*0.2=$<<225*0.2=54>>54 off the price
That means he only pays 225-54=$<<225-54=171>>171
So he saved 300-171=$<<300-171=129>>129
#### 129

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
